Body:
x_test = [0, 3, 6, 10, 13, 16, 20]
y_test = [0.00705517, 0.0054838, 0.01330298, 0.29433415, 0.01146449, 
    0.00080912, 0.00771055]
hyper = Hypergeometric(seed=SEED, N=7, xlim=(0, 20))
x, y = hyper.data
assert hyper.M == 24
assert hyper.m == 15
assert hyper.X == 15
for i, j in zip(x, x_test):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
for i, j in zip(y, y_test):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
